Name: Pangea Survival
About the game: Pangea Survival is an open-world dinosaur-centric game that features both dinosaurs and human hunters on a series of large artificial islands. On these islands, dinosaurs are faced with the tasks of competing against rival species for food, water, and territory. Humans in Pangea Survival are mercenaries; collecting and hunting dinosaurs provides rewards which can be used to purchase more ammo, supplies, food, and better equipment. The islands currently have over 30 species of dinosaurs present, along side crocodiles, monitor lizards, and fish. The biomes present on the islands are diverse: Redwood Forests, Pine Forest, Desert Dunes, Red Deserts, Coastal regions, Tropical Jungles, and Grasslands to name a few. Hidden away in remote regions, are relics of human bases, these have questionable operative stability for communication, but may possess viable resources.
